options.text: Hello. Would you be kind enough to hold this ladder still for me so I can fix the chandelier?

refusal.text: We're famous actors. Go ask someone else!

sabotage_phase.text: [You unscrew the chandelier partially and move the ladder]

options.text: Since I have fixed the chandelier, I can now see the beautiful light it shines upon you two.

bait.text: Does it really? Are we sparkling???

options.text: Yes! Actually, step a bit backwards so the light can make you glow better.
